message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about $125?
I'm still willing to negotiate, Bob! I can do $130, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I still think I can get a better deal. How about $128?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think we're getting close to a fair price. How about we meet at $129?
I'm not sure I'm willing to meet you at $129. I was thinking more along the lines of $127. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think we're really close to a fair price. How about we meet at $128?
